history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 1 use: fractran_step_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: fractran_step_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: fractran_step_inv. sauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: apply fractran_step_inv in Hf as [l0 [p [q [r [-> [Hnd Hpq]]]]]].
apply fractran_step_zero with (l := (p, q) :: r) (x := 0) in Hf.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hf was not found in the current environment.

In environment H2 : forall (P : list (nat * nat)) (x y : nat), P /F/ x → y -> exists l (p q : nat) (r : list (nat * nat)), P = l ++ (p, q) :: r /\\ (forall u v : nat, In (u, v) l -> divides v (u * x) -> False) /\\ q * y = p * x remove_zero_den_Forall : forall l, fractran_regular (filter (fun c : nat * nat => if Nat.eq_dec (snd c) 0 then false else true) l) l : list (nat * nat) H : l = nil -> False H0 : fractran_regular l Unable to unify "Forall (fun c : nat * nat => snd c <> 0) (filter (fun c : nat * nat => if Nat.eq_dec (snd c) 0 then false else true) ?M1988)" with "l /F/ 0 → 0".

original: intros Hneq Hreg Hf. apply fractran_step_inv in Hf as [l0 [p [q [r [-> [Hnd Hpq]]]]]]. apply fractran_step_zero with (l := (p, q) :: r) (x := 0) in Hf. - contradiction Hf. - simpl. now apply remove_zero_den_Forall.
